Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=かくとうぎ|格闘|tr1=kakutō|t1=fighting, grappling|技|tr2=gi|t2=skill}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かくとうぎ}}

# a [[combat sport]], such as [[boxing]], [[judo]], or [[wrestling]]
